question.text: When may you sound the horn?

explanation.text: Never sound the horn aggressively. You MUST NOT sound it when driving in a built-up area between 11.30 pm and 7.00 am or when you are stationary, an exception to this is when another road user poses a danger. Do not scare animals by sounding your horn.

answer.text: To give you right of way
To warn others of your presence
To make slower drivers move over
